text: Viktor Viktorovich Zozulin (; 10 October 1944 – 16 August 2022) was a Russian actor. He was born in Moscow, then-Soviet Union. He was known for his roles in Operation Y and Shurik's Other Adventures, I Loved You and King Stag. His career began in 1965. Zozulin died on 16 August 2022 in Moscow from a long- illness at the age of 77.Умер народный артист России Виктор Зозулин ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Viktor Zozulin
